mapper.insert: insert into confrim_xianwan (id, appId, appSign, adid, adName, adImg, taskId, describe, dayNo, award, itemId, itemType, answer, status, rejectCause, sign, createdTime) values (#{params.id},#{params.appId},#{params.appSign},#{params.adid},#{params.adName}, #{params.adImg},#{params.taskId},#{params.describe},#{params.dayNo},#{params.award}, #{params.itemId},#{params.itemType},#{params.answer},#{params.status},#{params.rejectCause}, #{params.sign},#{params.createdTime})
